ygData.subject: Re: Mensors Hands off
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Astroblast has almost left the area, RYO D, Lilly is the only one who has a chance of hitting him. Also, I dont think that you can get to Firearm, Menasor

OOC: Astroblast has almost left the area, RYO D, Lilly is the only 
one who has a chance of hitting him. Also, I dont think that you 
can get to Firearm, Menasor has been hovering above him for like 2 
days our time (read post 28348 which happened long before you 
even arrived) waiting for Yan to post about Firearm. (I think that 
rdahl reminded Yan about that one today). Watch the shot rule with 
Lilly too, I think the max shots is four.


::Astroblast::
Astroblast, having picked up the bots on his radar, manages to 
dodge the fire balls and the cones of acid, and most of the arrows, 
but one skims his wing leaving a mark in the armour. 


On 26 Feb 2001, at 17:41, RYO D wrote:

> ((I'm not sure this is up to date my mail is kinda screwed up. If its not 
> tell me and I'll repost.Excuse grammer.))
> 
> ::The LA2::
> LA2 swing around wide as it enters the CF air defense zone.
> 
> ::Liono::
> Liono swings open the dock bay doors and draws Spark Reaver((Sword)) 
> activating the Plasma edge and jumps out of the LA2. Liono uses all his 
> power to swing the Spark Reaver at Right side of Mensor's Wrist on the arm 
> reaching for Firearm. "Hands OFF!"
> 
> ::Dark::
> Dark draws his beam sword and follows behind Liono swings around to the left 
> side. Dark Swings the with all his power trying to help Liono swings at 
> Mensor's  Wrist on the left side on the hand reaching for Firearm. "Like my 
> little brother said Hands off."
> 
> ::Koj::
> "Can't let you have all the fun" Shoots 25 chains 15 trying to wrap around 
> Mensors fingers the other 10 trying to Wrap up Firearm. As Koj jumps out of 
> the shuttle.
> 
> ::Tiamat & Inu::
> Both Tiamat and Inu-Yasha fire 4 meduim sized Fireballs balls and cone of 
> Acid at Astrotrain. ((That mean 8 fire balls and twin cones of acid.))
> 
> ::Lilly::
> "Go meet Wildwing I'll make sure Liono ,Koj and Dark stay out of trouble." 
> Lilly Loads her Bow and Fires 8 high power Proton arrows at Astrotrain 
> thrusters as she exits the LA2.
> 
> ::LA2::
> The LA2 takes off heading to meet Wildwing
>
